sectionHeading: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Monday January 16 in observance of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. Day.
Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 17 at 6:30 a.m.

incidentType: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. Day Freedom March on Monday January 16  from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m.:
location: Rolling street closures starting at Heritage Hall, proceeding on Vine St towards E Main St, and back to Triangle Park.
The ferry is closed until further notice due to high water conditions.
